code: export const formatCurrency=value=>{if(!value)return'R$ 0,00';return new Intl.NumberFormat('pt-BR',{style:'currency',currency:'BRL'}).format(value);};export const formatDate=date=>{if(!date)return'';return new Date(date).toLocaleDateString('pt-BR');};export const formatDateTime=date=>{if(!date)return'';return new Date(date).toLocaleString('pt-BR');};export const formatCPF=cpf=>{if(!cpf)return'';return cpf.replace(/(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{3})(\d{2})/,'$1.$2.$3-$4');};
